default.009A:
int skin = 40
request_model skin
load_all_models_now

int woman = create_char {type} PedType.CivFemale {model} skin {xyz} 2479.0 -1660.0 13.0

mark_model_as_no_longer_needed skin
default.00A5:
while true
    wait 0
    get_area_visible store_to interiorId
    if and
        is_key_pressed Key_F10
        interiorId == Outside
    then
        while is_key_pressed Key_F10
            wait 0
        end
        request_model #HUSTLER
        load_all_models_now
        repeat 
            wait 0
        until has_model_loaded #HUSTLER
        get_active_camera_coordinates store_to x y z
        get_closest_car_node_with_heading x y z store_to nodeX nodeY nodeZ heading
        clear_area nodeX nodeY nodeZ 3.0 False
        create_car #HUSTLER nodeX nodeY nodeZ store_to Car
        set_car_heading Car heading
        mark_car_as_no_longer_needed Car
        mark_model_as_no_longer_needed #HUSTLER
    end
end
default.00E1:
while true
    wait 0
    
    if
        is_button_pressed {pad} PadId.Pad1 {buttonId} Button.DpadUp // usually "G"
    then
        print_string_now {text} "Button is down." {time} 1
    end
end
default.0109:
const Player=0, Pad1 = 0, DpadUp = 8
while True
    wait 0
    if 
        is_button_pressed Pad1 DpadUp // usually "G"
    then
        add_score Player money 1
    end
end

default.01F5:

int health = get_char_health carl

default.020A:
const LockoutPlayerOnly = 3
float x,y,z, radius=10.0
int Car
while true
    wait 100
    get_active_camera_coordinates store_to x y z
    if get_random_car_in_sphere_no_save_recursive x y z radius findNext True skipWrecked True store_to Car
    then lock_car_doors Car lockStatus LockoutPlayerOnly
    end
end

default.0321:
float x,y,z, radius=15.0
int Char
while true
    wait 2000
    get_active_camera_coordinates store_to x y z
    if get_random_char_in_sphere_no_save_recursive x y z radius findNext True skipDead True store_to handle Char
    then explode_char_head Char
    end
end

default.03A1:
while true
    wait 0

    float x, y, z
    x, y, z = get_char_coordinates $scplayer

    draw_sphere {pos} x y z {diameter} 1.0
end
default.03D3:
while true
    wait 0

    int interiorId = get_area_visible 
    if and
        is_key_pressed {keyCode} KeyCode.F8
        interiorId == 0 // outside
    then
        // wait for key release
        while is_key_pressed {keyCode} KeyCode.F8
            wait 0
        end
        
        float pos[3]
        pos[0], pos[1], pos[2] = get_offset_from_char_in_world_coords $scplayer {offset} 0.0 5.0 0.0

        
        float dir
        pos[0], pos[1], pos[2], dir = get_closest_car_node_with_heading {pos} pos[0], pos[1], pos[2] // find road
        
        clear_area {pos} pos[0] pos[1] pos[2] {radius} 3.0 {clearParticles} false
        
        request_model #HUSTLER
        load_all_models_now
        int carHandle = create_car {modelId} #HUSTLER {pos} pos[0] pos[1] pos[2]
        set_car_heading carHandle {heading} dir
        mark_car_as_no_longer_needed carHandle // will despawn on its own
    end
end
default.0449:
while true
    wait 0

    if
        is_char_sitting_in_any_car $scplayer
    then
        print_formatted_now {format} "Player in vehicle!" {time} 100
    end
end
default.0605:
request_animation "SUNBATHE" // not needed for "PED"!
load_all_models_now
        
task_play_anim {handle} $scplayer {animationName} "ParkSit_W_idleA" {animationFile} "SUNBATHE" {blendSpeed} 0.5 {loop} true {lockX} false {lockY} false {keepLastFrame} false {time} 10000
        
remove_animation {animationFile} "SUNBATHE" // not allowed for "PED"!
default.0804:
set_char_coordinates $scplayer {pos} 2503.3533 -1686.2238 12.5

request_animation "CRIB" // not needed for "PED"!
load_all_models_now

task_char_slide_to_coord_and_play_anim {handle} $scplayer {pos} 2515.0 -1689.0 13.6 {heading} 50.0 {radius} 0.5 {animationName} "PED_Console_Loop" {animationFile} "CRIB" {blendSpeed} 1.0 {loop} true {lockX} false {lockY} false {keepLastFrame} false {time} 8000

remove_animation {animationFile} "CRIB" // not allowed for "PED"!
default.0812:
request_animation "SWAT" // not needed for "PED"!
load_all_models_now

task_play_anim_non_interruptable {handle} $scplayer {animationName} "swt_lkt" {animationFile} "SWAT" {blendSpeed} 3.0 {loop} true {lockX} true {lockY} true {keepLastFrame} false {time} 60000

remove_animation {animationFile} "SWAT" // not allowed for "PED"!

alter_wanted_level $player1 {wantedLevel} 5 // interruptions
default.09C0:
const player=0, posOffset=120.0, negOffset=-120.0, NumLock = 144
int Char, Car, Blip
float x,y,z,x2,y2,z2

get_player_char Player store_to Char   
while true
    wait 0
    if 
        is_key_just_pressed NumLock
    then  
        get_offset_from_char_in_world_coords Char posOffset posOffset posOffset store_to x y z
        get_offset_from_char_in_world_coords Char negOffset negOffset negOffset store_to x2 y2 z2    
        get_random_car_of_type_in_angled_area_no_save x2 y2 x y 20.0 #TAXI store_to Car
        if Car <> -1           
        then add_blip_for_car Car store_to Blip
        end
    end
end
